DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether gevokizumab effective treatment moderate severe acne vulgaris .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Gevokizumab Treat Moderate Severe Acne Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis moderate severe acne vulgaris Acne vulgaris unresponsive oral antibiotic Willingness maintain current habit facial cleaning , shave , application cosmetic end study Use medication treatment specify pretreatment time period end study Beard , moustache , sideburns facial hair may interfere evaluation Other form acne History malignancy within 5 year History allergic anaphylactic reaction monoclonal antibody History tuberculosis History chronic systemic infection Female subject pregnant , plan become pregnant Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
